name: Idle Gatherer
description:
Harvest your way through many resources to own all the tools and reach paradise in this incremental idle game!

Idle Gatherer is an incremental-casual game which put you in the hands of a normal guy who just wants to go on an expensive vacation. However, you must do lots of mining and grinding to muster up the cash! Chop wood, slash sticks, and smash n’ grab rocks to craft tools or sell to the shop for coins!

Features:
- A crafting system that utilizes your hard-earned resources
- A shopping system to buy new equipment (and sell resources)
- Three different environments to travel across
- Stackable item effects
- Satisfying tapping mechanics

*Please note that the game doesn’t support saving progress, and may be implemented in a future update.

Project created over 3 weeks from July 5th to July 26th, 2019
